name: arangodb3
description: A distributed free and open-source database with a flexible data model for documents, graphs, and key-values. Build high performance applications using a convenient SQL-like query language or JavaScript extensions.
preInstallNotes: The default configuration requires at least 3 nodes having 4.75 CPU, 22GB of memory and 20GB of persistent disk storage in total.
postInstallNotes:
The ArangoDB DCOS Service has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://github.com/arangodb/arangodb3-dcos
	Issues: https://github.com/arangodb/arangodb3-dcos/issues
postUninstallNotes:
The ArangoDB DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at https://github.com/arangodb/arangodb3-dcos to clean up any persisted state.
